StartDate.description: Start date of the employee in the company

ExitDate.description: Exit date of the employee from the company

BusinessUnit.description: Business unit where the employee works

value_dict.CCDR: Employee belongs to CCDR business unit
value_dict.EW: Employee belongs to EW business unit
value_dict.PL: Employee belongs to PL business unit
value_dict.TNS: Employee belongs to TNS business unit
value_dict.BPC: Employee belongs to BPC business unit
value_dict.WBL: Employee belongs to WBL business unit
value_dict.NEL: Employee belongs to NEL business unit
value_dict.SVG: Employee belongs to SVG business unit
value_dict.MSC: Employee belongs to MSC business unit
value_dict.PYZ: Employee belongs to PYZ business unit

value_dict.Future Start: Employee will start in the future
value_dict.Voluntarily Terminated: Employee has voluntarily left the company
value_dict.Leave of Absence: Employee is currently on leave of absence
value_dict.Terminated for Cause: Employee was terminated for a cause

EmployeeType.description: Type of the employee (Full-time, Part-time, etc.)

value_dict.Zone C: Employee belongs to pay zone C
value_dict.Zone A: Employee belongs to pay zone A
value_dict.Zone B: Employee belongs to pay zone B

TerminationType.description: Type of termination if the employee has left the company

TerminationDescription.description: Description of termination if the employee has left the company

DepartmentType.description: Department type where the employee works

value_dict.Production: Employee works in the production department
value_dict.Sales: Employee works in the sales department
value_dict.IT/IS: Employee works in the IT/IS department
value_dict.Executive Office: Employee works in the executive office
value_dict.Software Engineering: Employee works in the software engineering department
value_dict.Admin Offices: Employee works in the admin offices

DOB.description: Date of birth of the employee

State.description: State where the employee is located

JobFunctionDescription.description: Description of the job function of the employee

value_dict.Fully Meets: Employee fully meets the performance expectations
value_dict.PIP: Employee is under Performance Improvement Plan

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in human resources analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the employee data, please predict the current employee rating.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in human resources analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the employee data, please predict the performance score.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is the performance score Fully Meets[0], Exceeds[1], Needs Improvement[2], or PIP[3]?

class_value_dict.Fully Meets: Employee fully meets the performance expectations
class_value_dict.PIP: Employee is under Performance Improvement Plan

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in human resources analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the employee data, please predict the employee status.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is the employee status Active[0], Future Start[1], Voluntarily Terminated[2], Leave of Absence[3], or Terminated for Cause[4]?

class_value_dict.Future Start: Employee will start in the future
class_value_dict.Voluntarily Terminated: Employee has voluntarily left the company
class_value_dict.Leave of Absence: Employee is currently on leave of absence
class_value_dict.Terminated for Cause: Employee was terminated for a cause

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in human resources analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the employee data, please predict the pay zone.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is the pay zone Zone C[0], Zone A[1], or Zone B[2]?

class_value_dict.Zone C: Employee belongs to pay zone C
class_value_dict.Zone A: Employee belongs to pay zone A
class_value_dict.Zone B: Employee belongs to pay zone B

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in human resources analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the employee data, please predict the employee type.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is the employee type Contract[0], Full-Time[1], or Part-Time[2]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in human resources analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the employee data, please predict the termination type.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is the termination type Unk[0], Involuntary[1], Resignation[2], Retirement[3], or Voluntary[4]?
